summary.span: 命名空间包含使用 TCP 协议向远程位置传输消息和对象以及从远程位置传输消息和对象的信道。

span.span: The namespace contains channels that use the TCP protocol to transport messages and objects to and from remote locations.

summary.span: 默认情况下，TCP 信道以二进制格式对对象和方法调用进行编码以便传输，但在信道的配置属性中也可以指定其他编码和解码格式化程序接收器。

span.span: By default, the TCP channels encode objects and method calls in binary format for transmission, but other encoding and decoding formatter sinks can be specified in the configuration properties of a channel.

summary.span: 命名空间最重要的类之一是 类。

span.span: One of the most important classes of the namespace is the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类组合类和类，并可以用于接收和使用 TCP 协议发送消息。The class combines the class and the class, and can be used to both receive and send messages using the TCP protocol.
